title: Class
description: A class defining the properties that distinguish one set of features from another.

name.description: The name of the class, e.g. for display purposes. The string is UTF-8 encoded.

semantic.description: Identifies a property with a well-known meaning. The string is UTF-8 encoded. Semantics defined by this extension include `NAME` and `ID`

description.description: The description of the class. The string is UTF-8 encoded.

properties.description: A dictionary, where each key is a property ID and each value is an object defining the property.
